articles.title: Jyothi Yarraji wins India’s first gold medal at 2023 Asian Athletics C'ships: Watch - The Bridge
articles.description: Jyothi Yarraji is the new Asian champion in 100m hurdles. Ajay Kumar Saroj (1500m) and Abdulla Aboobacker (Triple Jump) also won gold medals.
articles.content:
Jyothi Yarraji won India's first gold medal at the 25th Asian Athletics Championship in Bangkok on Thursday. 
Jyothi won the 100m hurdles gold medal in a rain-marred final, which probably caused her… [+1527 chars]
